# ASAuthorizationResult.passkeyAssertion(_:)

**Case**

A passkey credential from an assertion request.

## Declaration

```swift
case passkeyAssertion(ASAuthorizationPlatformPublicKeyCredentialAssertion)
```

## Authorization results

- **ASAuthorizationResult.appleID(_:)**: A credential from an Apple ID authentication.
- **ASAuthorizationResult.customMethod(_:)**: A chosen custom authorization method.
- **ASAuthorizationResult.passkeyRegistration(_:)**: A new passkey credential from a registration request.
- **ASAuthorizationResult.password(_:)**: A password credential.
- **ASAuthorizationResult.securityKeyAssertion(_:)**: A security key credential from an assertion request.
- **ASAuthorizationResult.securityKeyRegistration(_:)**: A new security key credential from a registration request.
